attributes.action: For the Queen to step in and use her Prerogative powers to Dissolve parliament
attributes.additional_details: The Queen has to take control of Parliament dissolving it and forcing Brexit to happen then after brexit has happened the Queen needs to call a general election
attributes.background: The British people voted to leave the EU with or with out a deal the current  prime Minister  Boris Johnson can’t do that with the rest of the  Parliament stopping it for their own selfish interests thus  Parliament has failed us  MPs work for the people and they are not doing that.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. Dissolution is no longer a Royal Prerogative power, it's a statutory provision under the Fixed-term Parliaments Act 2011. You can find out more here:

https://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/SN03861/SN03861.pdf

There are already petitions about leaving the EU in October 2019 which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254329

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257347

You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.
